articles.description: Mario Andretti returned to an F1 car cockpit over the weekend, driving a 2013 McLaren at Laguna Seca...
articles.content:
Mario Andretti has joked about his bucket list now being complete, having driven a modern McLaren at Laguna Seca over the weekend.
The 1978 F1 World Champion was given the opportunity to take the wh… [+3133 chars]
